definitions.text: an inability to resist the gratification of whims and desires
a disposition to yield to the wishes of someone
examples: too much indulgence spoils a child

definitions.text: the act of indulging or gratifying a desire
the remission by the pope of the temporal punishment in purgatory that is still due for sins even after absolution
examples: in the Middle Ages the unrestricted sale of indulgences by pardoners became a widespread abuse
